titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on naphthalic acid anhydride.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5539-5540)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/5/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1997, the suspension of duty on naphthalic acid anhydride.
